data.text: Guys!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Well, well! What we got here!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Turrets up top.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I can deal with those things!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Surprise, grounders!
data.speaker: Elite Shock Trooper

data.text: Shit! We too late?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Look!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: They're deploying it in that state?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That's far enough, you bastards! I'm taking you down!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: Cloud, are you all right?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'm fine. You guys good to go?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: As good as I'll ever be!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Cloud? What'd it do to you?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Dammit! Big boy means business!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Gotta stop it quick!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We gotta pour it on from both sides!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey! We gotta stop this thing!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Go all out, guys!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Dammit! Not this again!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We need to find a way to stop it!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Not this again! Cloud, can you move?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'm good! Let's do this!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey! He's going after Tifa!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Not if I can help it!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Check it out!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Don't stand in front of it. Run!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Shit! Run, run!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Gotta back off.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Time to haul ass!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Better run before it's too late!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Damn, that thing's powerful!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That was too close...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We need to come up with a plan.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Incoming! Gotta move!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: This guy really wants to see us dead.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's coming! Gotta find someplace safe!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I hate when they do that!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Let's take care of them first.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Damn, I can't get to it.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: This is gettin' ridiculous... If only those damn things weren't in the way!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We have to start taking down the ones that we can.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Now we can finally take it down!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: All right! Now this is what I'm talkin' about!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now we can hit it where it hurts!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Damn, all those drones. Time to do your thing, big man.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Watch and learn! Just make sure you got my back, all right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now! Get in there!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Yep! I hear you loud and clear!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Not that shit again!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's coming. Move!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Let me show ya how it's done!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah. Light 'em up!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Now!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Right! Give it all you've got!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Dammit! Why won't it give up?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: No time for questions. Gotta move.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: We almost got this. Come on, guys!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Bring it on!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Let's show 'em what we're made of!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Incoming!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Gotta hit it right after it attacks!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Damn, big boy is tough!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hit it right after it strikes!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Again!?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: This ends right here!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Quickly now. Quickly!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: That's it. That's the smell. This place reeks of mako.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Looks like we made it.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Layout's the same as Reactor 1?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah. We're near mako storage.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Let's move.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Sephiroth... SOLDIERs...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Mako... Shinra...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'm sick of this!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'm sick of all of this!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey! SOLDIER boy!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Tifa─
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: How much time we need?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Got all the time in the world.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This one comes with a remote detonator.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Courtesy of Jessie.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We withdraw to a safe distance─
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: then...kaboom!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: "Safe" distance?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What? No such thing?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: What the─ Where you goin'!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Weirdly perfect timing.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Wait a minute. Is someone watching us?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Greetings, my dear sewer rats!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: As architect of our populace engagement campaign, I, Heidegger, head of Public Security...
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: bid you welcome.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: The chief warmonger.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You should be flattered.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Right now, you command the undivided attention of every soul in Midgar.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: What is this!?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Breaking news from Mako Reactor 5.
data.speaker: Announcer

data.text: Shinra has confirmed the reactor to be the target of the bomb threat issued by the terrorist group Avalanche.
data.speaker: Announcer

data.text: Members of the group were observed entering the facility, and security is currently sweeping it for explosive devices.
data.speaker: Announcer

data.text: We now go live to the scene...
data.speaker: Announcer

data.text: I'm here in the Sector 5 undercity.
data.speaker: Reporter

data.text: Having confirmed the terrorists' target...
data.speaker: Reporter

data.text: the Shinra Emergency Operations Center has issued an evacuation advisory.
data.speaker: Reporter

data.text: Residents are outraged that the tragedy of Mako Reactor 1 was only the first attack...
data.speaker: Reporter

data.text: in a campaign of violence.
data.speaker: Reporter

data.text: President Shinra has issued a statement providing assurances that the terrorists will soon be brought to justice.
data.speaker: Announcer

data.text: And so, to a people beset by chaos and uncertainty, we will offer the finest comfort:
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: bread and circus!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: The big boy!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I give you Shinra's latest triumph of technology!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: The airbuster! Your executioner!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Engineering on the line.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: Currently, the airbuster is only sixty percent operational.
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: The estimates were optimistic...
data.speaker: Subordinate

data.text: I'm on air!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: To the imbecile in charge down there─
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: you are hereby ordered to seize those intruders and bring them to me!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Come quietly or there'll be trouble!
data.speaker: Elite Shock Trooper

data.text: You heard the man! Get these components prepped for the airbuster ASAP!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: It's ready, sir!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Component outbound from B8.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Copy, B8.
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: Intruders!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Take 'em out!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Status report!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: We're short on AI cores, but tracking down replacements!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: We're short on BBs, but tracking down replacements!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: We're short on M units, but tracking down replacements!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: We're making our final adjustments!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Work faster! Or you'll hear it from the brass!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: Look! They're still preppin' it!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: They're here!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: Hold 'em back! Buy us every second you can!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: We're gonna get through this. We're gonna make it home.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: All of us. No exceptions.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Right. We don't wanna disappoint Marlene.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: That goes for you too, Cloud.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Right?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You'd better give her a big ol' smile this time.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: If the price is right.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Look!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: President Shinra!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Oho. The eyes of one who has bathed in mako...
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Which would make you...a SOLDIER?
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Ex-SOLDIER.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Once a SOLDIER, always a SOLDIER.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Though not, alas, for very long.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Accelerated cellular degradation being the most common cause of death by far.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: This is classified, of course, but every SOLDIER knows the truth.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: ...That's right.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Think you forgettin' someone!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Would that I could. You strike me as the type to go on without end.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Ain't enough hours in the day to hold you to account for all your crimes!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: And what a wasteful indulgence it would be even if there were.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Oh, okay then...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Let's talk about wasteful indulgences.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: What is mako? The lifestream!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The lifeblood of the planet─our planet!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: But Shinra keeps on slurping it up like a thirsty dog!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Whadda you think's gonna happen if you don't stop, huh!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: But...for whose benefit, I wonder.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: We do indeed keep on "slurping it up," as you say...
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: The true nature of mako is known to one and all, yet the people willfully turn a blind eye to the cost.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: As you must surely be aware?
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Don't you dare try to put this on us!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: If anyone's going along with your plans...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: it's 'cause you brainwashed 'em!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Such methods are beneath me.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: As are you, my faithful sewer rats.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Henceforth allies of wicked Wutai, our sworn enemy.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Thank you for stoking our people's patriotic fervor.
data.speaker: President Shinra

data.text: Wutai? The hell we are!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You still don't understand your role in this.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: What are they doin'!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Don't you see? You fools were never in control.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Never anything but pawns in our plans to sell great and glorious war to the people!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: And your instruments of insurrection will detonate─
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: when we so choose!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Goddammit!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now let us raise the curtain on our main event!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: The trial of the eco-extremist group "Avalanche"!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Terrorists who conspired with Wutai against Midgar!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Your guilt is undeniable! Your punishment: death!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: I'm sick of this.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'm sick of all of this!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It's just like...
like when I failed you.
Cloud! Get your head in the game!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We're counting on you, man.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Behold the full potential of the airbuster!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Time to carry out your executions!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: We don't have long to get clear!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Take Tifa, and get outta here!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I...I was wrong aboutchya─
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This ain't the end of the line for you or me!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Cloud!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: C'mon!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey, watch it!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm not seeing a way down...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey! Check it out.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: They sic this big boy on us, we'd be screwed six ways from Sunday.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Mechanized units like these were designed to take out giant monsters. Probably a new prototype.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: If they do decide to deploy it, then our best bet would be to run like hell.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Then let's hope he sleeps through the explosion.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Almost there...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: The smell... It takes me back...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Shut the hell up!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I don't believe it... We played right into Shinra's hands!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yeah. And their bullshit news is already peddling their false narrative.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So we're screwed.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: No no no no no! Hell no!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Listen! They wanna turn this into a spectacle? Then I say let's give 'em one!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Let's take down Shinra's big-ass mech in front of everybody!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Okay. I'm sold.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Barret, Cloud! Over here!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It looks like a few of its components are still in transit...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We'll see about that.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Could tamper a little with its loadout...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: And give ourselves an edge?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: There should be a console somewhere...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: This the console you talking about?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Think you can get it to work?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Needs a keycard.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Well, let's find it then!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Try that keycard of yours.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: "M units," huh? I'm guessing that's some sort of component?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yep. An enhancement powered by liquefied materia.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Sounds bad.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Pretty sure I can divert this unit for disposal.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You know, I think I saw one of them trying to hide something...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You think they're watching us? Even now?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yep. Probably got a live feed.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Nothing we can do about it...'cept smile for the folks at home.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Component outbound from B7.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Copy.
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: We've lost contact with B8. Send some men to check it out. We've got a schedule to keep!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: Intruders! Seize them!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: What does an "AI programming core" do?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Increases processing power dedicated to motor function computation. Makes it move real quick.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: A "real quick" giant robot, huh? That doesn't sound good. Anyway, we should weigh our options carefully.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Console talks about big bomber shells. You acquainted?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We called 'em BBs. One's enough to blow you to hell and back.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Could divert them and give it a couple less shots to take us out. Make the call.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: AI programming core... Hmm... What are you thinking, Cloud? Should we get rid of it?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Feel like scrapping some BBs?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hurry up and decide what you wanna get rid of. It's past time we taught Shinra a lesson!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hell is this?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: M unit. Another type of enhancement.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Your call if you wanna nix it.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: An AI programming core. Should we discard this or something else?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Big bomber shells. We should divert them if you think it'll improve our odds.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That's an M unit, right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yep.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: This is our chance to really stick it to Shinra. We should think it through before we make a decision.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Engineering, this is B7! We've got hostiles! Requesting backup!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Negative B7, airbuster prep is priority. You're on your own!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: Copy!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: AI programming cores help it move faster, right? Divert it or not?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: From what you said, even one big bomber shell is too many. But I'll let you be the judge of that.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: The more M units it's got, the tougher it'll be, right? We could do something about that. If you want.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So, where did we send the discarded stuff?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: To a storeroom for defective equipment, I'm guessing.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That so... You think these defective shells and programming cores might be valuable enough to warrant a little...detour?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Maybe.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I say we grab 'em.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hmph. If we get that far.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Okay! Listen up, y'all!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Everything Shinra has told you is a goddamn lie! Mako is the lifeblood of our planet!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Those greedy bastards are bleeding it dry! Y'all gotta rise up─
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Barret!? Who are you talking to?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: The people! Put me on TV, I'mma drop some truth!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Thousand gil says they cut the sound.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Good to go?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Locked and loaded!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Heads up! We got company!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Take 'em down!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Engineering, this is B6─enemy contact! Enemy contact!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Shit! We can't afford any more delays. You need to keep those components coming─do whatever it takes!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: Solid copy. B6 will hold the line!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Error. Keycard required for operation.
data.speaker: Console

data.text: Heidegger's got no idea who he's messin' with!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Serves y'all right!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Just imagining their faces when they find out...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That should slow them down some.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Heidegger's not gonna like that.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I was thinking the same thing.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yeah. That'll do.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: What the hell? You got a better plan or something?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We doing this or not?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Make up your damn mind already!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Why you overthinking this, man?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We're running out of time here...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I tell you what, I ain't never looked forward to an execution more in my entire life!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You don't say.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We're about to make fools outta Shinra while the whole damn city's watching!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Times like these you gotta savor!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Oh no─if you're about to ask me to dance, then don't.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: C'mon, don't be shy! How 'bout you, Cloud?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I don't dance.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
Dispose of a programming core?
(Cost: 1 Keycard)

Dispose of a big bomber shell?
(Cost: 1 Keycard)

Dispose of an M unit?
(Cost: 1 Keycard)
B5, this is Engineering. You need to pick up the pace─we're running dangerously low on components because of those terrorists!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: Copy!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: They're here!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Stop them!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Programming core flagged for disposal.
data.speaker: Console

data.text: Big bomber shell flagged for disposal.
data.speaker: Console

data.text: M unit flagged for disposal.
data.speaker: Console

data.text:
We're coming up on the exit.
Tifa─detonator still in range?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We should be good.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: The moment big boy goes down, you hit that switch.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Right.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Diverting programming core to disposal room.
data.speaker: Console

data.text: Diverting big bomber shell to disposal room.
data.speaker: Console

data.text: Diverting M unit to disposal room.
data.speaker: Console

data.text: Hey─you still got keycards? You might wanna use 'em before the showdown.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Proceed without using keycards?
Can't say we didn't prepare. Now we just gotta get it done!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: What is the status of my airbuster? Report!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: I'm sorry, sir. We're going to need more time!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: The terrorists have breached the room and are engaging our forces. At this rate, there's no telling when we'll have it fully operational!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: As expected. Deploy it at once!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: But sir, it's not ready yet!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: That was an order!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Understood. Prepare the airbuster for immediate deployment!
data.speaker: Engineering Officer

data.text: Y'all never had a chance!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey, guys.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Looks like a performance assessment, don't you think?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Reduced response time... Should work in our favor.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We'll figure out its weaknesses as we fight it. As long as we stay focused, we'll be fine. We can do this.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: We definitely took it down a peg or two... Yeah, I'd give us a fighting chance.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: For real, though, we need to talk victory poses. Something coordinated for the live, on-camera finish!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Could blow up big─start a new trend!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Veto.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Huh. No way up?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: No way we're getting back up that pipe...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Keep looking.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hear that?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Damn near gave me a heart attack!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Big boy's going to an execution all right. We're gonna put him out of his misery while the whole damn city watches!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We give it our all and we'll win!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: What? Open it already!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's locked down.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Is there any way we can get it open?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yeah. From that room over there.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: So how do we do this?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It's simple, really.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: We move the levers at the same time.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Got these ones.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'll take left. Which just leaves right, SOLDIER boy.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Emergency lockdown is currently in effect.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: So we need to synchronize our movements?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: In that case, follow my lead.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Nah─Tifa's.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Fine! Have it your way!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Okay, pay attention, you two...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Watch carefully!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Move yours the same way as mine.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey, are you even trying?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Mother─
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: How did we screw that up?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Try to match my timing, okay?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Don't rush it!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Um... Breathe when I breathe!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: No need to grip it so hard!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Shit!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Your timing is all wrong, man!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm, uh, still getting warmed up!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Focus! Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Shake it off. Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We got this. Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: How 'bout a chant to help us time it right? Aaa-vaaa-lanche!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This is exhausting...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We'll get it this time. Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey, I think I should lead after all. Five...four...three-two-one-go!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Much better.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Let's just get through this. Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Got an idea! Seventh seventh heaven heaven hoo-ah! Seventh seventh heaven heaven hoo-ah!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hell no!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: How 'bout this then? Seveeenth heaven! Heaven! Heaven!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We're doing it my way! Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Emergency lockdown─disengaged.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Hell yeah!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We really did it!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Great timing─right on the money!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yeah...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Gotcha!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Now that is what I call teamwork!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Go team.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Thank god...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: How the hell we made it through with dumbass here, I'll never know.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We really are in sync. Took the words right outta my mouth.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What did you say!?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Okay, that's it. Let's go.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: This would be the treasure vault?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: That's right.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What's the catch?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Need to bypass a high-level security lock.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Different from the other one?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Same deal, but we gotta do it several times.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Not a problem!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah, let's try!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Tightwads! But hearing that just makes me wanna rob 'em more!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah. Let's stick it to 'em!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Was hoping you'd say anything but that...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Screw it?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Aw, hell no! We're doing this!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah. We gotta try!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Both of 'em sound like a real pain in the ass.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So this is some hardcore shit... We up for this?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Disable security system?
Delta-level security lockdown is currently in effect.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Okay, guys. You know what we have to do.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Copy me?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: No, Tifa leads.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Oh, fine! After you, girl.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Gotta get past level one first, right? Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Alpha-level security─disengaged.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: That was great, you guys! Let's keep it up!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Alright. Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Beta-level security─disengaged.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Wow! Think we've got this?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hell yeah, bring it on! Ain't nothing I love more than sticking it to Shinra!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Halfway there. Steady, guys. Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Gamma-level security─disengaged.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: No way! You guys are naturals!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Okay, final round. Don't lose focus. Three, two, one...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Delta-level security─disengaged. Disposal room now accessible.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Boo-yah! Bet all the Shinra suits watching enjoyed that!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You guys were great!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I swear, your timing was perfect. It's almost like...you could read my mind. SOLDIERs can't do that, can they?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I can't─yet.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Thank god.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: C'mon, you two, let's see what we got.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Take that, Shinra! Makin' us jump through hoops to steal your shit...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Didn't take as long as I expected! Good work guys!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Likewise. You made it easy.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I put my heart and soul into those countdowns...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Finally. I was beginning to think it'd never end.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Ayo, Cloud, what's the deal? You really a bona fide SOLDIER?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We didn't train for this stuff.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: All that marching with no rhythm? How did you SOLDIER on?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Okay, that's enough of that. Let's see what's inside.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: All right, time to go!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Then we'll deal with you ourselves!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Dammit! You'll pay for this!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Here maybe?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Well now! That could work.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm next.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Witness the full potential of Shinra's technology!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Engage the electro-magnetic field. See how the airbuster sits safely beyond your reach.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Quake in fear at the big bomber's destructive power!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: The big bomber will soon be ready to fire again, and you will know true pain.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Why, you sneaky little rats. Don't think you can put off judgment forever!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: The battle's far from over.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Why you impudent wretches!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: What? How is that even possible!?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Tankbuster ready to fire! Now, show me how fast you can run!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: You are helpless before its defenses. I will watch you perish right there!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: You sewer rats are truly pathetic!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: You struggle in vain against the airbuster. Shinra's advanced weapons are unstoppable!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Hmph! I hope this isn't the end for you three. I was looking forward to a battle against worthy opponents.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Hmph! Don't think you've won just yet. Unless of course you think you can keep this up.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Didn't expect that? Let's see how you do now!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: How does it feel to hear your friends cry out in agony?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Insolent fools! You brought this torment upon yourselves by opposing us!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: You are no match for this perfect specimen of AI─the great airbuster!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Huh? An error with an AI core? As long as the airbuster operates as intended. This will end soon enough.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Hmm, it's taking some time. Must be a flaw in the AI programming cores. No matter─we have all the time in the world.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Multiple malfunctioning cores? They should've done a thorough check. This may take more time than I thought, but only a little. Now we can enjoy toying with our prey.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: What do you mean the AI cores are all offline? Heads will roll for this! But we have plenty of time. We will destroy these sewer rats.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Sewer rats of Avalanche, pawns of Wutai! The people of Midgar will now see you for the cowards you are!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Now, let me hear you scream!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Impressive. Most impressive.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: It's even more magnificent than I'd imagined.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: To fan the flames of hatred, you need a suitably spectacular display!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Once caught in our magnetic field, you'll be utterly at our mercy.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: This is what I like to see. Things working better than intended.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: How does it feel to be a prisoner in your own body?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Enjoying the staggering sensation?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: This is proof that our combat AI cannot be outdone!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Programmed with only the most perfect strategies!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Commencing phase two of the combat trial. You've seen but a fraction of this machine's true capabilities!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Your efforts are futile. It'll chase you to the edge of the world if need be.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Now this is a splendid sight.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Like rats in a trap─how's that feel!?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: It's no use. There's no escape.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Yes, that's it! Very good.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Now you will learn what happens to all those who oppose Shinra.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Enjoying your time with Shinra's new weapon?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Writhe and squirm for me! You didn't think your deaths would be quick, did you?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Behold the full potential of the airbuster!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Time to carry out your executions!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: And now for the grand finale! The tankbuster is ready to be deployed!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: I have toyed with you three for long enough. Now I shall watch you die screaming!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: This airbuster is more flawed than I had hoped. I expected better from Advanced Weaponry boys.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: This data will prove most useful!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: It's almost time for the grand finale! You will burn like the reactors you so hate!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: My dearest Avalanche. My apologies, but it is time that we part ways.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: This footage will prove invaluable in raising the morale of our Shinra rank and file.
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Heidegger dummy data
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Dummy data - Don't think you can easily get to the airbuster!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Dummy data - A new phase is about to commence!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Dummy data - The airbuster's in its final phase. What now?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Dummy data - Avalanche, it's time to say goodbye. Don't worry, I'll put your battle data to good use!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: Kinda scary, huh?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: S'all in the mind.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Where is everybody?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: You mean Shinra? Got spooked and cleared out, is my guess.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So...it was like this last time?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Little more chaotic─ain't that right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Yeah.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: We get out the same way we got in. Let's double back.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Attention all security forces! I repeat─
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: you are to bring the insurgents to the command center without further delay!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: What's Engineering's progress on getting that airbuster operational?
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: ...Still only sixty percent!? Bullshit!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: I swear, if you fail me, I'll throw you off the plate myself!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: So get it done already!
data.speaker: Heidegger

data.text: All clear! Now let's see what these bastards were up to...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hold up. Ain't we gonna sabotage this thing?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Pretty sure that console controls the door.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Let's not leave before we're done, huh?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: We shouldn't rush this, Cloud. Really.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey, don't go off on your own!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You really that impatient, Cloud?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hey! Get over here!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You really need to see this!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Cloud, check this out!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Huh? Find something?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Keycard. Might come in handy.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You think!? Nice work!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You find it?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yeah.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Good job! Now, let's check out that console.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: So far so good.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Right. Let's move!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Looks like there's two consoles this time.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Hah! Double the sabotage!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: If we can find the keycards.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Any luck with the keycards?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Barret's console must be for other components.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: "AI programming cores," it says...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Find those keycards.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Without keycards we can't do shit.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This console's for big bomber shells.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Any cards?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Just the one.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Two choices, and only one single-use card...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It's up to you, Cloud.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Piece o' cake!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Find any cards?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Only one. And this time we've got three choices...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Take your pick.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Only one.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Gotta put it to good use...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Buncha pushovers. C'mon, y'all. Let's see what kinda mischief they were getting up to.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Four consoles. And never enough keycards...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Think we've done enough to weaken the robot?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: All that we can, at least.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It's all good. The stage is set─all that's left is to hijack Heidegger's show!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Not that way!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: That just leads back down.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Got no time to double back.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We gotta go the other way!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Bastard cleared the way for us.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Real subtle invitation.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: We were gonna spring the trap anyway!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Huh? You headed back down? You got shit to do, I won't stop you, but...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's cool if you wanna go back, but...for what?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Emergency lockdown is in effect.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Why does everything have to be so damn complicated...?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You know, the faulty equipment storeroom's that way too.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Do you think we'll find the components we diverted there?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: It's like a treasure vault! Hoo, I like the sound of that!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Whatcha'll got tucked away in that vault, huh?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Wait. That our priority?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Delta-level security lockdown is in effect.
data.speaker: Announcement

data.text: Score! It's just like Cloud said!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: They say a job well done's its own reward... I say take everything that ain't nailed down!
data.speaker: Barret
